reviews.review_msg: Stuart is a truly excellent professor and academic. He is very eloquent and always prepared, making his lectures very interesting and engaging. He is rooting for his students and wants them to do well - even beyond the classroom, Stuart strives for success for his students who reach out.

By far my favourite course ever taken at SFU. Stuart is sooooo inspiring and intelligent. He seems to talk a lot, however he ends class earlier which is awesome. The material covered in lecture was super relevant and relatable. Final assignment was super cool - not your typical paper (but you can if you want to). He wants students to do well!!!!!!!

He uses outdated services (Canvas) to register for course discussions allowing other students to erase names. This happened to me & my friend more than 3 times and Stuart did nothing about it claiming this is the 'first time in 7 years' this has happened. Instead of addressing the issue he blamed Canvas and continued to let these problems occur.
